title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2E.18 - Symbols
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2E.18 - Symbols

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 03A The display of educational plaques should generally be
limited to a period of three years from the time a particular symbol is
introduced in an area. After this period, installation of that particular
plaque should be discontinued, although it need not be removed if it is still
serviceable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2E.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
